titles.title: Recognizing the importance of animal-based protein as a component of the balanced diet of most individuals in the United States.
Recognizing the importance of animal-based protein as a component of the balanced diet of most individuals in the United States.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Livestock, Dairy, and Poultry.

bill.summary:
Recognizes the importance of animal-based protein as a component of the balanced diet of most individuals in the United States.
Encourages the Department of Agriculture (USDA) to continue promoting the health benefits of, and consumption of, animal-based protein.
